## ğŸ’¡ Äá»€ XUáº¤T FIX

### Option 1: Properly kill with timeout
```c
static int stop_hostapd(void) {
    pid_t pid = read_pid_from_file("/tmp/hostapd.pid");
    if (pid > 0) {
        kill(pid, SIGTERM);
        wait_for_termination(pid, 5);  // 5 sec timeout
        if (is_process_running(pid)) {
            kill(pid, SIGKILL);  // Force kill
        }
        unlink("/tmp/hostapd.pid");  // Cleanup
    }
    return HAL_STATUS_OK;
}
```
